level.heading: INFORMATION TO BE PROVIDED BY THE OWNER OF REAL PROPERTY (ยง 9-363)

level.text: Each owner of real property where there is construction of a new improvement, an addition to or renovation of an existing improvement, construction in progress, a conversion, or damage or destruction of an improvement shall submit the following information to the Deputy Chief Financial Officer for purposes of determining whether the property shall be assessed and the assessed value of the real property:
Breakdown(s) of costs (including the detail of construction costs and the budget report-hard and soft costs);
Draw schedules (the actual costs as drawn from the construction loan);
A copy of the certificate(s) of occupancy issued;
Building features and amenities (such as the number of sprinklers and elevators); and
Other information the Deputy Chief Financial Officer deems necessary.
